title: Why is that ... Chalet Stencil????
content:
It’s probably not a custom font, but I think Pepsi did a fine job using a stenciled Chalet for their new “all-natural” (and obvious catering to women) cola.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100807040350im_/http:/typophile.com/files/6a00d834522c5069e2011168c3ef4c970c-500wi_5625.jpg.jpeg)

Mikey :-)
author: SuperUltraFabulous
